title: Ticket #5900: condor_q ignores different batch names within a cluster
description:
If you submit multiple jobs that have different batch names but are part of the same cluster (by having multiple JobBatchName commands in your submit file), condor_q still treats them as part of the same batch in its output.

If you have multiple clusters that would be grouped into a batch, but have different batch names specified, condor_q does treat these as separate batches.
creator: wenger
